name: Ai Maze
description:
A first person game where you run from a AI controlled snake monster!

the only way to win is to exit the maze.

controls:   WASD to move.  Space to jump.   mouse to look around.

Credits:

https://www.zapsplat.com/

https://devassets.com/

https://assetstore.unity.com/

feedback would be appreciated.
